header.title: Hello, I am
header.objectiveText: to bring modern, user-friendly, inclusive and environmentally-friendly websites to life

about.title: About
about.text: After working for 10 years in the field of occupational health, I felt the need to learn new things and express my creativity. Becoming a web developer quickly became obvious to me. I first trained on my own for a year, then started a degree program at OpenClassrooms in 2024. This portfolio is the final step of that journey, and I hope the first towards new professional adventures!

card1.title: Development of a real estate rental web application
card1.technos: React . React Router . Vite . Sass . CSS Animations
